q_ch: Advanced裁剪组还未完成的裁剪任务是哪些顾客的订单？
q_en: Which customer orders are the cutting tasks that the Advanced Cutting Group has not yet completed?

steps.sql: SELECT DISTINCT o.id, o.order_name FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id JOIN orders o ON op.order_id = o.id WHERE wg.name = 'Advanced Cutters' AND ct.status != 2;
steps.description: To find the customer orders associated with cutting tasks that the working group named 'Advanced Cutters' have not yet completed, we need to identify the cutting tasks with status not equal to 2 (completed) and join them with the orders and customers tables to get the customer order details.

response:
Hello there! 😄

I checked the data for you, and it seems that there are no customer orders with cutting tasks that the "Advanced Cutters" have not yet completed. 🎉 It looks like they're all caught up with their work! If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. 😊
